doc.author: 朱朝辉
doc.description: 值班短信订阅情况查询

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_SmOrderDutyList.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ pid, dutyroomid, dutyroomname, aheaddaynum, starttime, endtime, isholiday, status /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_sm_smsorderduty where 1=1 $customwhere$ and loginname = #sys_loginname#

select.name: dutyroomid
select.sql: select pid, organizationname from bs_t_Duty_Organization where organizationname >'0' and state = '1'
